career.certificates.scrimba.title: Scrimba: The Frontend Developer Career Path
about.p1: Hi! Glad you're here. As a frontend developer, I help turn your ideas into real, well-functioning, and visually clean websites – whether you're a freelancer or representing a new brand.
about.p2: In my work, I focus on responsiveness, fast loading, and ensuring the site provides a convincing experience on every screen size. Whether it's an introduction page, service description, or creative landing page, it's important to me that the result reflects the client's personality and goals.
about.p3: I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, work with Bootstrap and Laravel frameworks, and constantly expand my knowledge. I have already created several websites to order, and I also improve through my own projects – because I believe learning never stops.
contact.intro: Do you have an idea or want to launch a website?
Write to me or call me – I'm happy to discuss it with you in person!
services.fullSite.title: Full Website Development
services.fullSite.desc: Modern, responsive websites tailored to your ideas – from scratch or based on existing concepts.
services.frontendDev.title: Frontend Development
services.frontendDev.desc: Clean, structured HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development that looks good and works well.
services.responsive.title: Mobile-Friendly Design
services.responsive.desc: Design that adapts to every screen size, so visitors have a great experience anywhere.
services.structuredCode.title: Structured Code
services.structuredCode.desc: Transparent, reusable, and easily maintainable code – designed for the long term.
services.animations.title: Animations and Interactions
services.animations.desc: Subtle effects, hover animations, and scroll solutions that bring the site to life.
services.support.title: Technical Support
services.support.desc: Bug fixes, updates, aftercare – reliable support even after development.
